text: asia of the corpus callosum - Intellectual disability - Large earlobe - Macular degeneration - Pes planus - Pointed chin - Poor eye contact - Sensorineural hearing impairment - Smooth philtrum - Strabismus - Upslanted palpebral fissure - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The frequency of a sign or symptom is usually listed as a rough est
